description.copy: Z. Brown Distillary is tucked into the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains and founded upon a deep-rooted respect for the long-standing, pre-prohibition traditions of making spirits in North Georgia and Appalachia. Z. Brown Distillary combinds history, tradition and culture to create a truly American-made whiskey. For GRAMMY award-winning musician Zac Brown, of Zac Brown Band, te distillery is a return to his hometown.
